data.title: The Heckscher Foundation for Children
data.meta_description: Our mission is to level the playing field for underserved youth. We do that by focusing our giving with educational philanthropic organizations. Our education foundation support programs, partnerships, and targeted solutions in college access and success, workforce training and jobs access, and arts or physical education that improves achievement in the classroom.
data.text:
Our venture philanthropy approach to grantmaking takes shape when seen through the lens of our four high-leverage giving strategies.

Heckscher Foundation Challenge

Catalytic Giving

Strategic Partnerships

Targeted Problem Solving

Proven Models

Provoking thought pieces on how we stare down obstacles, challenge the status quo and identify bold solutions for underserved youth.

Strategic Giving Essays

Publications

Heckscher Audio Series
